LOTlib.Examples.SimpleMCMC package¶

Submodules¶

LOTlib.Examples.SimpleMCMC.Rosenbrock module¶

Just playing around with vector-valued hypotheses. This is a simple sampler for a posterior shaped like the exp(-RosenbrockFunction)
